summary: A mod for players who plays skyrim on legendary. Its a simple mod which adds 2 new standalone followers with Unique Armor sets, 2 new spells.
descriptionHtml:
Hey Guys!

First: sorry for my bad english i hadnt the best grades in school hehehe xD
So... Its my first mod, its not perfect but i like it as it is and thats the reason i wanna share it with u! :)

I HOPE U ALL ENJOY!!!

***READ THE RECOMMENDED MODS LIST***

My Mod:

A mod for players who plays skyrim on legendary. Its a simple mod which adds 2 new standalone followers with Unique Armor sets.

1. Ares,
who is a little bit overpowered with special perks and spells. He has his own Blades Armor and Sword.
He can be very dangerous with his Fire/Ice Shouts so be careful in fights he can do tons of dmg.

2. Gilford,
who is tanky and strong with sword and shield. He Uses his own Faraam Armor and can tank very much damage but
he is still weak to magic also is ares.


Location:
Both can be found in Dragonsreach near The King Balgruuf.


The 2 SPells:

1.Cataclysim,
which absorbs magicka, health and also stamina.
50 Points per second.

2.Cataclysim The End,
which does a lightning beam
150 Points per second.

Location:
Both can be found in Dragonsreach, in the room from farengar practising his Job or whatever he does there.

Recommended Mods/Dlc's:
Dawnguard
Dragonborn

More Draconic Dragon Aspect

glowing eyes vs.4
